content: Embed a viewer to allow users to open a file for viewing from the corresponding room.

comment.text: Embed a viewer allows users to open a file for viewing from the corresponding room. This feature is used in the RoomSelector preset and appears as the viewer component.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "قم بتضمين عارض" (qim bi tadmin 'aarid) literally translates to 'Embed a viewer'. While technically correct, a more natural phrasing in Arabic, especially in a technical context, might be "أضف عارض" (add 'aarid) which means 'Add a viewer'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: أضف عارض

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "من الغرفة المناسبة" (min al-ghurfa al-munasiba) translates to 'from the appropriate room'. A more common and potentially clearer way to phrase this in Arabic, considering context, could be 'من الغرفة المعنية' (min al-ghurfa al-ma'niyya) which means 'from the relevant/concerned room'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: من الغرفة المعنية

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'İstifadəçilərə həmin otaqdan baxmaqla faylı açmağa icazə vermək üçün izləyici əlavə edin' is a bit literal and awkward. While technically correct, it doesn't flow naturally in Azerbaijani. 'Həmin otaqdan' (from that room) sounds clunky. It would be better to rephrase to emphasize the room's context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: İstifadəçilərə, müvafiq otaqdan faylı baxmaq üçün açmağa imkan verən izləyiciyi yerləşdirin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'izləyiciyi' sounds slightly archaic or overly formal. A more common word for 'viewer' in this context would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a more common word for 'viewer', depending on the specific Azerbaijani dialect and target audience. Perhaps a loanword adapted to Azerbaijani phonology would be appropriate, or a closer synonym.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Vložení prohlížeče, který uživatelům umožní otevřít soubor pro prohlížení v příslušné místnosti' is a bit literal and awkward. A more natural phrasing would better convey the intended meaning of embedding a viewer.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Implementace prohlížeče pro zobrazení souborů v dané místnosti.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation reads a bit long and complex. Consider breaking it down into two sentences for clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Implementujte prohlížeč. Umožněte uživatelům otevřít soubor pro zobrazení v dané místnosti.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Betten Sie einen Viewer ein' is a very literal translation of 'Embed a viewer'. A more natural phrasing would be 'Integrieren Sie einen Viewer...'. 'Betten' suggests something being placed in a bed, which is not the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Integrieren Sie einen Viewer, um Benutzern das Öffnen einer Datei zum Anzeigen im entsprechenden Raum zu ermöglichen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'to allow users to open a file for viewing' can be more naturally expressed in Spanish. 'Para verlo' is technically correct, but sounds slightly awkward. A more fluent option would incorporate 'visualización'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Incruste un visor para permitir a los usuarios abrir un archivo para su visualización desde la sala correspondiente.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Upota esikatselu salliaksesi käyttäjien avata tiedosto katseltavaksi vastaavasta huoneesta' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Embed a viewer to allow users to open a file for viewing from the corresponding room.' The wording is awkward and slightly confusing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Upota katselija, jotta käyttäjät voivat avata tiedoston tarkasteltavaksi kyseisestä huoneesta.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'esikatselu' (preview) is used where 'katselija' (viewer) should be. This changes the intended functionality.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'esikatselu' with 'katselija'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a bit long and complex for optimal clarity in Finnish. Breaking it down might improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider splitting the sentence into two: 'Upota katselija. Näin käyttäjät voivat avata tiedoston tarkasteltavaksi kyseisestä huoneesta.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "open a file for viewing" is not perfectly captured by "ouvrir un fichier en lecture seule". While "lecture seule" conveys 'read-only', it implies a specific mode of access. The original phrasing is more general, simply allowing viewing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Intégrez le lecteur pour permettre aux utilisateurs d'ouvrir un fichier pour visualisation à partir d'une salle.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Տեղադրեք դիտող՝ օգտատերերին թույլ տալու համար բացել ֆայլ՝ համապատասխան սենյակից դիտելու համար:' is a bit literal and clunky. The phrase 'բացել ֆայլ՝ համապատասխան սենյակից դիտելու համար' can be simplified and more naturally expressed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Տեղադրեք դիտող՝ օգտատերերին հնարավորություն տալ բացել եւ դիտել ֆայլը համապատասխան սենյակից։

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence could benefit from punctuation for better readability. The colon at the end feels somewhat abrupt.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Տեղադրեք դիտող՝ օգտատերերին հնարավորություն տալ բացել եւ դիտել ֆայլը համապատասխան սենյակից։

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of 'Embed' as 'Incorpora' is technically correct but doesn't fully convey the sense of integrating a viewer. 'Incorpora' suggests a more general inclusion rather than a specific integration for functionality.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Integra un visualizzatore per consentire agli utenti di aprire un file per visualizzarlo dalla stanza corrispondente.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'visualizzatore' is a valid translation for 'viewer', in this context, 'riproduttore' might be more appropriate depending on the type of file being viewed. 'Visualizzatore' is more generic. It's difficult to know without more context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Integra un riproduttore per consentire agli utenti di aprire un file per visualizzarlo dalla stanza corrispondente.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ビューアを埋め込み、対応するルームからファイルを開いて閲覧できるようにします' is a bit literal and could be more natural. '閲覧' is correct, but the overall phrasing feels slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 対応するルームからファイルを開き、閲覧できるようにビューアを埋め込みます。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The original sentence uses 'allow users to open a file for viewing'. The Japanese translation could better reflect the nuance of providing the functionality, rather than simply allowing it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 対応するルームからファイルを開いて閲覧できるビューアを埋め込みます。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ເປີດ' (pered) is used for both 'open' and 'view'. While technically correct, it might be more accurate to use a different word to specifically indicate 'viewing' a file.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing 'ເປີດ' with a more specific term for viewing, such as 'ເບິ່ງ' (beng).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure 'ຝັງຕົວເບິ່ງເພື່ອໃຫ້ຜູ້ໃຊ້ສາມາດເປີດໄຟລ໌ສໍາລັບການເບິ່ງ' is slightly awkward. The verb 'ເປີດ' (pered) feels redundant after 'ເບິ່ງ' (beng).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider restructuring the sentence to be more fluid. For example: 'ຝັງຕົວເບິ່ງເພື່ອໃຫ້ຜູ້ໃຊ້ສາມາດເບິ່ງໄຟລ໌ຈາກຫ້ອງທີ່ສອດຄ້ອງກັນໄດ້' (Embed a viewer to allow users to view a file from the corresponding room).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "atvērt failu skatīšanai" is a bit awkward. While technically correct, it's not the most natural way to express "open a file for viewing" in Latvian. It sounds overly literal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Iegult skatītāju, lai lietotāji varētu atvērt failu apskatei no attiecīgās telpas.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of "ļautu" can be replaced with a more concise and natural verb.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Iegult skatītāju, lai lietotāji varētu atvērt failu apskatei no attiecīgās telpas.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'corresponding room' is not accurately translated. 'Bijbehorende kamer' implies a room that belongs to the file, which might not be the intended meaning. A more accurate translation would focus on the context the user is viewing the file within.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sluit een viewer in zodat gebruikers een bestand kunnen openen om het te bekijken vanuit de betreffende ruimte/kamer/context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "Osadź przeglądarkę" is a literal translation of "Embed a viewer" and while technically correct, it might sound slightly awkward in Polish. A more natural phrasing would be something like "Dodaj widok" or "Zintegruj widok".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dodaj widok, aby umożliwić użytkownikom otwarcie pliku do przeglądania z odpowiedniego pokoju.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Embed' is better translated as 'Integrar' or 'Adicionar' rather than 'Incorpore'. 'Incorpore' implies a more complete and potentially disruptive integration.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Integrar um visualizador para permitir que os usuários abram um arquivo para visualização na sala correspondente.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Incorporează vizualizator' is a bit clunky. 'Incorporează' implies a more formal integration than 'Embed'. A more natural phrasing would be 'Adaugă un vizualizator' or 'Include un vizualizator'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Adaugă un vizualizator

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'anumită sală' could be more naturally translated. 'Corresponding room' implies the room is specifically designated for the file. 'O sală' or 'într-o sală' would be more accurate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: într-o sală

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'නරඹනයක් කාවද්දන්න' doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'embed a viewer'. It translates more to 'present a viewing'. The intended meaning is to integrate or insert the viewer.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: තවත් නිවැරදි පරිවර්තනයක් වන්නේ 'ගොනුව බැලීම සඳහා දෘශ්‍යකරණය යාවත්තු කරන්න' (yawatthu parivarthana 'Gonyawa balewma dehadaya drusyakarayana yawatthu karanna')

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'නිශ්චිත කාමරයක ගොනුවක් බැලීම සඳහා' is a bit lengthy and could be simplified for better flow. While grammatically correct, it's not the most elegant wording in Sinhala.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: කාමරයක ගොනුව බැලීමට හැකි පරිදි දෘශ්‍යකරණය යාවත්තු කරන්න

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Vložte prehliadač' (Insert a browser) is not the best equivalent for 'Embed a viewer'. 'Embed' implies integrating something, not simply inserting it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Integrujte prehliadač...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing 'na prehliadanie' is a bit clunky. While technically correct, it could be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: na zobrazenie

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Vdelajte pregledovalnik' is a literal and slightly awkward translation of 'Embed a viewer'. A more natural phrasing in Slovenian would be 'Vstavite pregledovalnik' or 'Integrirajte pregledovalnik'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Integrirajte pregledovalnik

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the phrase 'za ogled' after 'datoteke' is a bit clunky. It's more idiomatic to omit it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vstavite pregledovalnik, da uporabnikom omogočite odpiranje datoteke iz ustrezne sobe.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "уградите" (ugradite) translates to 'install' or 'integrate', not 'embed'. The English word 'embed' implies a more seamless integration within the existing environment.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Уградите прегледач да бисте омогуц́или корисницима да отворе датотеку за преглед из одговарајуц́е собе.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "гледање" (gledanje) is understandable, "преглед" (pregled) is a more precise translation of 'viewing' in the context of document viewing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Уградите прегледач да бисте омогуц́или корисницима да отворе датотеку за преглед из одговарајуц́е собе.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ugradite pregledač da biste omogućili korisnicima da otvore datoteku za gledanje iz odgovarajuće sobe' is a bit literal. 'Ugradite' (embed) directly translates 'embed' but might not be the most natural phrasing in Serbian. A more natural translation for 'Embed a viewer' would be 'Dodajte pregledač' or 'Integrirajte pregledač'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dodajte pregledač da biste omogućili korisnicima da otvore datoteku za gledanje iz odgovarajuće sobe.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly literal and doesn't flow naturally in Turkish. 'Görüntüleyici yerleştirin' sounds awkward. A more natural phrasing would be something along the lines of 'Kullanıcıların ilgili odadan bir dosyayı görüntüleyebilmeleri için bir görüntüleyici ekleyin.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kullanıcıların ilgili odadan bir dosyayı görüntüleyebilmeleri için bir görüntüleyici ekleyin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'görüntülemek' (to view) is correct, but the entire phrase 'bir dosya açmasına izin vermek için' (to allow a file to be opened) is less elegant than just conveying the action of viewing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kullanıcıların ilgili odadan bir dosyayı görüntüleyebilmeleri için bir görüntüleyici ekleyin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Nhúng trình xem để cho phép người dùng mở tập tin để xem từ phòng tương ứng' is a literal translation that doesn't flow naturally in Vietnamese. 'Để xem' is repeated and sounds awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Cung cấp trình xem để người dùng có thể mở và xem tệp từ phòng tương ứng.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the phrase 'tập tin để xem' is a bit redundant. 'Tập tin' already implies it's for viewing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Simply use 'tệp' (file) instead of 'tập tin để xem'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase '进行查看' (jin xing cha kan) is redundant. '查看' already implies the action of viewing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 嵌入查看器，让用户能够从对应的房间打开文件。
